comment_body:
Looks like Satan hates family reunion, especially Jason's family.

Satan and Jason aside, interesting story. Makes you wonder what the hell just happened, and horrifyingly realistic too, since I've known people expressing relieve when their family members died as they don't like them.
Haha, hope you're having fun reading these scary stories like I am!
I sure am! Thinking of writing one myself!
I'll be sure to comment witty things on it too! Goodluck if you write a story!
